name: Mystic Sands
description:
Created for the "Secret Spaces" game jam under the category "Abandoned Cities".

 

Traverse the hash desert landscape to the secret place in this abandoned wilderness.

 

My first game for the Secret Spaces, Core Engine, Game Jam using the Core games engine.

 

A simple game with minimal gameplay and visual inspiration from Sylvain 'Tohad' Sarrailh designs.

Downloadable game on the Core Games Engine
